sentences: This is a great opportunity for a creative, enthusiastic software engineer to gain valuable practical skills with this leader in the field of visual effects for the film and TV industry
Mentored throughout, you will use your skills to develop, maintain and improve the VFX production pipeline, tools and workflows for the company’s film or TV projects
Using cutting edge technology, your work will adhere to production standards and guidelines for code quality, security, and output and increase the efficiency of the VFX team
This challenging and rewarding experience will provide an exceptional foundation for your future aspirations
Requirements You are eligible for an ESPA internship if you are a registered student or have graduated within the past two years and have access to some form of grant funding
Benefits See website for details of all ESPA benefits
For all internships over 6 months, additional benefits will be paid
